name: Pacific Strafe
description:
Pacific Strafe is an Arcade Shooter over multiple missions. You fly 1 of 5 different classic World War 2 fighter planes, fighting over the Pacific Ocean to liberate islands from the invading force. Protect your carrier from Torpedo planes, lead attacks on enemy battleships and assist your landing craft in taking back territory. Dog fight alongside your squadron as well escort bombers on their way to sinking ships.

* F4F Wildcat
* F6F Hellcat
* TBF Avenger
* P38 Lightning
* F4U Corsair

Pacific Strafe is in early release with a number of elements to be added. The game will continue to evolve over the coming months to a completed stage.

Currently 5 core missions completed, with additional to be added to complete a 12 mission set.
